about_the_game:
So, you arranged a meeting but the girl didn't show up. Of course, it happens! I've had it happen to me a billion times already. But if you were already prepared for the meeting, why not go to a bar and try your luck with someone else? How wonderful it is to spend time at a bar, sifting through potential partners!

  • SFW
    I can't believe I'm saying this, but yes, THERE ARE NO EROTIC SCENES in this game!
  • Humour
  • Dark Humour
  • EXTREMELY DARK HUMOUR
  • The jokes about dead infants (I CONDEMN AND APOLOGIZE ON MY KNEES IN ADVANCE)
  • Interesting stories and choice with consequences
  • THE FOG IS COMING
  • ｔＨ𝐄 𝕗𝕆𝓖 เѕ ɕ𝕆𝐌เ几𝓖
  • 𝔱h҉𝔢 𝔣o҉𝔤 𝔦s҉ c҉𝔬m҉𝔦n҉𝔤
  • T̶̞͋͆͒͜ͅḦ̷̗E̵̡̠͐͐͑ ̵̪̓F̵̙̳̪̀͌O̶͕͚͇͛͛͘G̵͕̝̔̆̋ ̸̟̯̦͐I̴͕̫̐S̶̞̟̔͝ ̸̧̌C̶͖͎͑͠ͅO̶̝̖͇͊̎M̵̲̖̎̏̀Ĩ̴̢͕̌N̵̡̻͂͛͠G̵͉͔͉͝


  • Akekandra - What could be better than starting a conversation with a joke? Maybe you can start with a joke about dead infants? (You will start with it, don't worry, you have no choice)
  • Mellissa - What a mommy! Bark for her!
  • Tracy - I won't even describe her, as she will die five minutes after meeting you.
  • Yana -What is your opinion on our God and Savior?
  • Toddina - Bought her a drink? Nice one! But how about buying Skyrim?
  • t̵͖́h̷͎̿e̶̟̎ ̵̧͆f̴̧̀ô̶͜g̴̘͑ ̸͖̽i̵̻̐s̶̤̒ ̷̨̍c̸͈̓ô̶͍m̸̱̾ḭ̴̓n̸͓̆g̶̍ͅ,̵̤͋ ̶͍̃t̶̓͜h̷͉̾e̵̛̠ ̵̪̾f̴̺̾ǒ̷̧g̴̝̓ ̸̮̇i̸̮̍s̵̽͜ ̴̠͗c̷̣͂o̶̢͋m̸̺̊i̶̖̅n̴̦̐g̸̡̔

content_descriptors.notes: Dead baby jokes and rude language

But if you were already prepared for the meeting, why not go to a bar and try your luck with someone else? How wonderful it is to spend time at a bar, sifting through potential partners!

name: Totally Accurate Dating Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You were stood up on your date! But you're already at the bar and won't leave without some female interaction!!! What awaits you? A simple stroll or a cult of hair enthusiasts? A pleasant conversation in a summer café or a detective investigation of a murder? Find out for yourself!
supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
